channel.title: Running the server
channel.description: I bought a vps, but since its linux, I've only got SSH Terminal access. That means batch files no longer work. Anyone wanna write me a shell script to run the server on vps(CentOS) from my pc at home(Windows)

item.title: Running the server
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

[quote=“Fear Nuture, post:2, topic:453542”][quote author=RylandAlmanza link=topic=556017.msg4072491#msg4072491 date=1344479042]

there is no LoginServer/player_data

In your MoparClassic folder? This is a MoparClassic server, right? If so, it should be there (Assuming you’re using the SerializedStorageMedium and DummyAuth.)
[/quote]

Yes, I found out the problem. I was using a previous version. Now I cant start my client…

@echo off
java -classpath moparclassic-client.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/MoparScape.jar;lib/defs.jar;lib/hex-string.jar; org.rscdaemon.client
pause

I’m getting the error:

Error: Could not find or load main class org.rscdaemon.client

I’ve changed the main class in the .bat about 4 times now and I cant figure it out[/quote]
What client are you using? Do you have ant installed? It’s easier to run it with ant. If you want to talk, I’m RylandAlmanza on steam, but I can’t do skype right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Running the server
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

Fear Nuture:

there is no LoginServer/player_data

In your MoparClassic folder? This is a MoparClassic server, right? If so, it should be there (Assuming you’re using the SerializedStorageMedium and DummyAuth.)

Read full topic

item.title: Running the server
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

Fear Nuture:

I’m still pretty noob at big time actual writing code, what do you mean? Right now it doesn’t save any player data correct? I’m using the complete default mpc source

By default, the player data is stored in LoginServer/player_data

Read full topic

MoparClassic comes with shell scripts…

Oh, you must be using some shitty source. NVM then.

go flame somewhere else, nobody cares about your useless fuck source
[/quote]In what way is it my source? It the communities source and project.

Also, since when is pointing out the fact that the source your using is shitty flaming?

demz just jokes. Where is player Data stored at in MC?[/quote]Wherever or however you want it.
